extraDescription: Business Transformation Architects (BTA) specializing in Business Planning and Consolidation (BPC) implementations using SAP.
comments: This contract was competitively sourced.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.This contract is a multi-year contract.This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 2406215941 dated 2016-02-16. The contract was misstated for $68,427.15 and has been corrected.
